lesson.title: Chapter 1 Mastery

sections.content: You've done it. With 10 or more achievements claimed, you've proven mastery of Chapter 1: DeFi Foundations. You understand identity, transactions, approvals, consistency, and commitment.

This isn't the end - it's the foundation. Everything you've learned in Chapter 1 prepares you for what comes next: trading, liquidity, lending, and beyond. The mountain has 12 chapters, and you've completed the first.

content: Your progress is permanent and verifiable
